About.subtitle: About Me
About.title: Full Stack Developer
About.p1: My name is <1>Kayo Weiber</1>, an Information Systems undergraduate at UEMG and a full-stack developer passionate about creating impactful software.
About.p2: I have about 4 years of experience in technical support and computer maintenance, and I am currently focused on software development.
About.p3: I'm deepening my skills with <1>Java</1> and Spring-Boot, aiming to become a <2>better</2> developer.
